name: Adventures with Alan Parkour 3D
description:
A game about Alan's adventure in the world of parkour, this exciting journey was created especially for you. You will be immersed in a pixel world, a huge space for the coolest parkour players. Take this challenge and complete more levels than your friends

Rush from block to block, jump over obstacles, try to survive and master landing techniques to win all levels. Your parkour skills and reflexes will be tested with huge epic runs and jumps. Beat the world record by exploring all new pixel levels.
- More than 50 levels of varying difficulty to complete
- Stunning 3D pixel graphics

The goal of the game is to reach the portal that will take you to the next level. To do this, you need to jump on the blocks without falling into the lava.
